item.title: More _The Turn of the Screw_ Data Analysis
item.description: I know I mentioned in an earlier post—a couple of different posts actually (here and here too)—that I’ve been doing a bunch of work with Henry James’s canonical The Turn of the Screw. I thought I would post a little bit more here of what I’ve been up to as of late with this. A student of mine was fascinated by the use of the words “prodigious” and “portentous” in the Governess’s narrative in Turn.
